Detailed Description

Definition at line 20 of file IAttributeStaticInfo.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum icomp::IAttributeStaticInfo::AttributeFlags
Enumerator:
AF_OBLIGATORY 

Active if user declared this attribute as obligatory.

AF_NULLABLE 

Active if this attribute can be unset (null).

Please note, that sometimes obligatory attributes can be nullable - for example for simple types default value can be taken.

AF_SINGLE 

Attribute is single type.

AF_MULTIPLE 

Attribute is multiple type.

AF_VALUE 

Attribute is simple value type.

AF_REFERENCE 

Attribute is reference to another component.

AF_FACTORY 

Attribute is factory of another component.

virtual const iser::IObject* icomp::IAttributeStaticInfo::GetAttributeDefaultValue ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get default attribute value.

Returns:
pointer to default attribute value, if set. Elsewhere it returns NULL.

virtual IElementStaticInfo::Ids icomp::IAttributeStaticInfo::GetRelatedMetaIds ( int  metaGroupId,
int  flags,
int  flagsMask 
) const [pure virtual]

Get related meta information.

This information in normally used by references and factories to provide information about related interfaces.

Parameters:
metaGroupIdID of data group of asked meta ID's.
flagsflag value of element.
flagsMaskmask value of element. Each element has flags. Only elements where element_flag & flagsMask == flags will be returned.

Implemented in icomp::CCompositeComponentStaticInfo::AttrAsOptionalDelegator, and icomp::TAttributeStaticInfo< Attribute >.
